channel.title: Portal 2 PS3 Steamwork features announced
channel.description:
[url]https://www.vg247.com/2011/01/18/portal-2-to-feature-ps3-pc-cross-platform-play-steam-key-included-with-ps3-version/[/url] [quote] [b]Valve’s just confirmed that Portal 2 will feature cross-platform play between PS3 and both PC and Mac owners of the game when it releases in April.[/b]
[b]Features also confirmed a “persistent cloud-based storage of PS3 saved games” as well as cross-platform chat on PS3, PC and Mac.[/b]
[b]Valve’s also confirmed it’ll include a “Steam Play” of the game with every copy of the PS3 version, which means a Steam key for the PC and Mac version will be included.[/b] [/quote] It's like Valve wants us to love them or something.

item.title: Portal 2 PS3 Steamwork features announced
item.dc:creator: Fancy_Pants
item.description:
Bobikan00sh:

so let me see if i can sum this thread up. someone mentioned that ps3 owners get 2 copies of a game called portal 2. one disc for ps3 and a code for pc. all the ps3 owners of the forum start blowing loads everywhere in excitement. then fancy pants mentions " hey, does this not seem rather hypocritical of a major game company to do when just a year or 2 before said company hated this console. it seems like they are brown nosing the hell out of play station owners."<-- this is a valid(if slightly biased) point to make. then, instead of being rational, all the people who were celebrating look up from there sephoroth/cloud slash fics long enough to scream FAGGOT XBOX FAN BOY!!! and start trolling and fighting with him because…fuck it there is no reason they just hate fanboy’s of the other console. so then maxey and garth bartin both decide to take this and run with it leading to a insult fight between the 3 of them, finally resulting in garthbartin blocking fancypants and pretending to take the moral high ground

  1. i dont enjoy any console
  2. always fucking

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2 PS3 Steamwork features announced
item.dc:creator: Omega_Absolute
item.description:
Maxey:

Console manufacturers always get a cut for every game sold. If Valve included a PS3 code in the PC version, Sony wouldn’t get that cut. I’m almost sure this is just exclusive to the PS3 copy.

However, I don’t think nothing is stopping Valve from including a Steam key in each 360 copy, as long as MS gets the cut from each copy sold.

But the problem with that is that you still need to link the console with your steam ID and MS would never never valve get away with that on their console. If valve could directly import DLC to your console through steam, MS would want to charge 15 bucks per transaction. Otherwise, since they aren’t linked, you essentially get two copies and you could just sell the other one and that would be selling someone elses work, which is of course illegal.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2 PS3 Steamwork features announced
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Console manufacturers always get a cut for every game sold. If Valve included a PS3 code in the PC version, Sony wouldn’t get that cut. I’m almost sure this is just exclusive to the PS3 copy.

However, I don’t think nothing is stopping Valve from including a Steam key in each 360 copy, as long as MS gets the cut from each copy sold.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2 PS3 Steamwork features announced
item.dc:creator: Mr_Freeman
item.description:
Shnazliztur:

Isn’t it weird that fanboys or at least pissed off people leave comments the size of freaking car manuals? attempts to re-rail topic I think VALVe made an awsome marketing decision not only to win back some of the lost Playstation fanbase, but its dangling a free copy in front of peoples faces. 2 for $60 is like the Orange Box all over again. Will this extra copy thing ever apply to the 360, or is this just for PS right now?

Wait a sec, this is starting to look like a car manual… :fffuuu:

Since when is a car manual only a few sentences long?

Also, it’s incredibly unlikely (like, 110% unlikely) that this would ever happen on the 360. MS would never allow steamworks features on their prized xbl.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2 PS3 Steamwork features announced
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
garthbartin:

That was actually pretty fucking far off. Guess what? I’ve never even played a PS3 game for more than like 30 mins. I’m pretty far from being a PS3 fanoby, I’m a pc fanboy, and until this, leaning towards xbox in the console war. Also Fancy Pants has a long long history of being an ass. I didn’t block her because of this argument, I blocked her because she’s trolling douchebag. And then, the argument was never that much about whether it was hypocritical, but whether or not PC users will get a PS3 copy like PS3 users get a pc copy. Which, ironically, you called unimportant compared to whether or not a company is hypocritical. Oh, and I don’t see how you thought Maxey was a part of this.

If you’re going to summarize a thread then you should probably actually know what the thread is about before you do it. You were pretty far off.

And then, finally, Valve changed their minds. They used to hate PS3, but after some bad run-ins with Microsoft and the possibility of some sweet deals with Sony, they changed their minds. Changing your mind doesn’t make you a hypocrite. They no longer think PS3 sucks, Gabe made jokes about they’re former dislike of Sony.

Also, is it just me or is it getting really really annoying every time a news article/ps3 fanboy says “Valve promised the PS3 version of Portal 2 would be the best”? People really need to learn to read. Gabe said “The PS3 version of Portal 2 will be the best on any CONSOLE.” NOtice he didn’t say pc, so it’s implied that the pc copy will be the best.

One of few times I’ve actually read your posts and not thought, this guys a dumbass.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2 PS3 Steamwork features announced
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Bobikan00sh:

tl;dr version: everyone in this thread(me included for totally different reasons) has internet assburgers syndrome. instead of posting a mature debate, they all degrade down into fucktard’s and fight over meaningless shit trying to prove a point they don’t really remember AND trying to save face.
i take back anything i said about you people being mature or humorous. your all 12 years old and what is internet tough guy?

That was actually pretty fucking far off. Guess what? I’ve never even played a PS3 game for more than like 30 mins. I’m pretty far from being a PS3 fanoby, I’m a pc fanboy, and until this, leaning towards xbox in the console war. Also Fancy Pants has a long long history of being an ass. I didn’t block her because of this argument, I blocked her because she’s trolling douchebag. And then, the argument was never that much about whether it was hypocritical, but whether or not PC users will get a PS3 copy like PS3 users get a pc copy. Which, ironically, you called unimportant compared to whether or not a company is hypocritical. Oh, and I don’t see how you thought Maxey was a part of this.

If you’re going to summarize a thread then you should probably actually know what the thread is about before you do it. You were pretty far off.

And then, finally, Valve changed their minds. They used to hate PS3, but after some bad run-ins with Microsoft and the possibility of some sweet deals with Sony, they changed their minds. Changing your mind doesn’t make you a hypocrite. They no longer think PS3 sucks, Gabe made jokes about they’re former dislike of Sony.

Also, is it just me or is it getting really really annoying every time a news article/ps3 fanboy says “Valve promised the PS3 version of Portal 2 would be the best”? People really need to learn to read. Gabe said “The PS3 version of Portal 2 will be the best on any CONSOLE.” NOtice he didn’t say pc, so it’s implied that the pc copy will be the best.

item.title: Portal 2 PS3 Steamwork features announced
item.dc:creator: Jnacool
item.description:
To be honest looking at the retail price on play.com and amazon.com for Portal 2 it would indicate that the PC version WILL NOT include a copy for your PS3, the retail price of the console versions seem to be around £5 more and therefore if the PC version did also include a PS3 version it would be at least the same retail.

It does leave the door open for valve to sell licences in the future which would allow any game to be played from either platform for a set price. A fantastic step forward for those of us who prefer PC gaming to console gaming.

Read full topic

Haters gonna hate…

item.title: Portal 2 PS3 Steamwork features announced
item.dc:creator: lalilulelo
item.description:
I’m not sure what the point is in getting Portal 2 for PS3 if you have a decent PC. Have you ever seen HL2 on the 360 Orange Box (which is supposedly better than the PS3 version)? It looks like shit compared to playing it on a PC with everything set on full. The difference will probably be smaller this time, but I bet the PC version will still look better.

Read full topic
